snippet: Rafael Nadal, the defending champion at Roland Garros, defeated Novak Djokovic on Monday to become the first man to win seven French Open singles titles.
abstract: Defending French Open champion Rafael Nadal defeats Novak Djokovic, 6-4, 6-3, 2-6, 7-5, to become the first man to win seven French Open singles titles; it is Nadal’s 11th Grand Slam singles title and his 50th career ATP World Tour-level singles championship.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal, the defending champion at Roland Garros, defeated Novak Djokovic on Monday to become the first man to win seven French Open singles titles.

headline.seo: Nadal Finishes Off Djokovic for Seventh French Open Title
headline.main: Nadal Embraces History With a Record Seventh Title on the Clay of Roland Garros
headline.print_headline: Nadal Embraces History With Seventh Title on Clay of Roland Garros
